alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Kearney; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 12:39AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Phelps, northwestern Kearney and southern Buffalo Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 1239 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Elm Creek to 7 miles northeast of Loomis to 6 miles west of Atlanta. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Elm Creek around 1245 AM CDT. Odessa around 1255 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Holdrege, Riverdale, Kearney, Axtell, Wilcox and Funk. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 255 and 281. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
